titles.title: Transportation Funding Flexibility Act
To amend title 23, United States Code, to eliminate the requirement that States spend a certain amount of their funds for transportation enhancement activities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Highways and Transit.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 9/23/2011--Introduced. Transportation Funding Flexibility Act - Revises the surface transportation program to eliminate the requirement that states set-aside a specified amount of their apportionment of surface transportation program funds for transportation enhancement activities.
